Package org.drools.builder.help

Providers helper classes that can be used during building.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DroolsJaxbHelperProvider DroolsJaxbHelperProvider is used by the DroolsJaxbHelperFactory to "provide" it's concrete implementation.
 

Class Summary
KnowledgeBuilderHelper Provides helper methods for working with JAXB and a Knowledgebase, it takes care of the Classpath issues when mapping against internal type declarations.
 

Package org.drools.builder.help Description

Providers helper classes that can be used during building.
